analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttikaḥ āsava āsava gocchaka ādi
na sanidassana sappaṭigham noāsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa, avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa avigate tisa
na sanidassana sappaṭigham no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigha

original: noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: nogantham dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigham noogham dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham no yogam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham no nīvaraṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na uparāmāsam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa
